name: ADIDAS FORUM MID
description: Adidas FORUM MID mens shoes.The shoes have shoelaces combined with velcro closure, embroidery decoration, adidas logo stripes on the sides of the shoe and a rubber sole.

name: ADIDAS STAN SMITH
description: For over 50 years Stan Smith shoes have taken their place as an icon.Design on white and clean times with the familiar holes of adidas on the sides of the shoe, logo and laces.This pair introduces redesign as part of Adidas' commitment to use only recycled polyester by 2024. A completely vegan structure and a sole made of rubber waste add to the classic style.

name: ADIDAS ULTRABOOST 21
description: Ultraboost Sneakers for Men - With every new update of Ultra boost shoes we are constantly raising the bar! Shoes with a linear energy push system, heel support and a stretch mesh sole with rubber. Get the boost you need with the return of the energy you have always wanted.

name: ADIDAS CONTINENTAL VULC
description: Adidas unisex sneakers with a logo - shoes wrapped in nostalgia and a retro look of the 80's. Canvas shoes with suede details and volcanic insoles. The bottom of the rubber maintains a clean and classic look while providing a comfortable and supple feel.

name: ADIDAS ADILETTE
description: Adilette Unisex Flip Flops - Unisex flip flops with the three familiar Adidas stripes and a thick sole. The Adilette flip-flops model first appeared in 1972 and has since become the most popular flip-flops ever with this lightweight style, which is built for fun and relaxation and gives the occasion comfortable      support for walking and spending time.

name: ADIDAS ZX 2K BOOST SHOES
description: Men's sneakers - shoes with graphics for a  refreshing look in the iconic ZX spirit.  Comfort and casualness with Boost padding that gives softness at every step.

name: ADIDAS STAN SMITH HOODIE
description: Stan Smith Unisex hoodie with a print that says it all. Elegant     design in clean and green lines that   salute the legendary shoe - Adidas Stan Smith.  For a pocket hoodie, long sleeves with a   logo print. Made of soft organic cotton fabri  that ensures you feel good inside and out.

name: ADIDAS CHILE HW
description: Adidas Chile HW mens hooded jacketThe coat has a fur-like hooded extension,  high collar, long sleeves combined with the brand logo stripes,  full zipper closure, two pockets on the sides, a pocket with a zipper closure on the front, an envelope-shaped pocket on the sleeve, the brand logo print on the front and cuffs on the extension.

name: ADIDAS Shirt
description: Adidas mens t-shirt. The shirt has a round neck key, short sleeves and a logo print on the front.

name: ADIDAS TS
description: Adidas TS men's sweatshirt for men.   The sweatshirt has a drawstring tied to the hood, long sleeves,   an Adidas logo print and a  pocket on the front and cuffs at the end.

name: ADIDAS ADICOLOR TREFOIL TEE
description: Back to sources. A classic t-shirt with the iconic Adidas  logo puts the brand's heritage at the forefront. A soft jersey fabric that makes this shirt so comfortable  that you will come back to it again and again. A winning classic!

name: ADIDAS ALL DAY I DREAM ABOUT SNEAKERS TEE
description: Adidas t-shirt for people with  a head in the clouds, who dream  big dreams and also make them come true! Minimalist graphics and a refreshing twist to the familiar Adidas    cloud-style logo on the front and print   with a caption on the back. The shirt is   made of cotton fabric that is so soft  and airy on the body that it will feel like wearing a cloud!
